results.name: a(n) = n XOR d(n) (cf. A000005).
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a[n_] := BitXor[n, DivisorSigma[0, n]]; Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Jul 08 2019 *)
